titleStmt.title: Albania or, Certaine concernments of Great Britanny. With an explication of the present state thereof; truely represented under the faigned person of Albania. / By George Raleigh.
titleStmt.author: Raleigh, George, b. 1600?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Sweeting, and are to be sold at his shop, at the signe of the Angell, in Popes-head-Alley,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
